sen.j: 石川理紀之助（いしかわ りきのすけ、1845年（弘化2年） - 1915年（大正4年））は、秋田県生まれ。
sen.e: Rikinosuke ISHIKAWA (1845 - 1915) was born in Akita Prefecture.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Rikinosuke ISHIKAWA (1845 - 1915) was born in Akita Prefecture.
Rikinosuke ISHIKAWA (1845 - 1915) was born in Akita Prefecture.

sen.j: 老農（篤農家）・農業技術指導者。
sen.e: He was an experienced farmer (an exemplary good farmer) and an instructor of agricultural techniques.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処ここで、指導者はleaderよりinstructorのほうが意味が近いと思います。
sen.e: He was an experienced farmer (an exemplary good farmer) and an instructor of agricultural techniques.
He was an experienced farmer (an exemplary good farmer) and an instructor of agricultural techniques.

sen.j: 「聖農」と称えられ、「寝ていて人をおこす事なかれ」のことばを残したことで知られる。
sen.e: He was admired as "a saintly farmer" and known to say "Do your work yourself; don't ask other people to do it for you."
He was admired as "a saintly farmer" and known to say "Do your work yourself; don't ask other people to do it for you."
He was admired as "a saintly farmer" and known to say "Do your work yourself; don't ask other people to do it for you."
Achievements
Achievements
Achievements

sen.j: 江戸時代末期から明治・大正にかけて活躍し各地の農業を指導した。
sen.e: Rikinosuke had great success as an instructor of agricultural techniques in various places from the end of Edo Period to the Meiji and Taisho Periods.
Rikinosuke had great success as an instructor of agricultural techniques in various places from the end of Edo Period to the Meiji and Taisho Periods.
Rikinosuke had great success as an instructor of agricultural techniques in various places from the end of Edo Period to the Meiji and Taisho Periods.

sen.j: 秋田県仙北郡の一貧村を救済・更正指導した。
sen.e: He saved and instructed to improve a poor village in Senboku-gun District, Akita Prefecture.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: He saved and instructed to improve a poor village in Senboku County, Akita Prefecture.
He saved and instructed to improve a poor village in Senboku County, Akita Prefecture.

sen.j: そのほか、2県8郡49町村の部落において産業・経済はもとより地理・歴史・人情・習慣についての全般的調査を行い、それに基づいて総合的な将来計画「適産調」を立案した（1896年 - 1902年）。
sen.e: In addition, he surveyed not only industries and economics but also histories, personalities, and customs of two prefectures, eight districts, forty-nine towns and villages and based on the research proposed comprehensive future plans, 'Tekisanshirabe' (1896 - 1902).
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: In addition, he surveyed not only industries and economics but also geographies, histories, personalities, and customs of two prefectures, eight counties, forty-nine towns and villages, and based on the research, proposed comprehensive future plans, 'Tekisanshirabe' (1896 - 1902).
sen.cmt: 訳漏れgeographiesを補足しました。Districts → countiesカンマを増やしました。
sen.e: In addition, he surveyed not only industries and economics but also geographies, histories, personalities, and customs of two prefectures, eight counties, forty-nine towns and villages, and based on the research, proposed comprehensive future plans, 'Tekisanshirabe' (1896 - 1902).

sen.j: 「井戸を掘るなら、水の湧く（沸く）まで掘れ」という彼の言葉は、2008年1月18日に福田康夫内閣総理大臣の施政方針演説の中で引用された。
sen.e: His words, "If you are going to do something, keep doing it until you see the result," were quoted by Prime Minister Yasuo FUKUDA in his administrative policy speech on January 18, 2008.
His words, "If you are going to do something, keep doing it until you see the result," were quoted by Prime Minister Yasuo FUKUDA in his administrative policy speech on January 18, 2008.
His words, "If you are going to do something, keep doing it until you see the result," were quoted by Prime Minister Yasuo FUKUDA in his administrative policy speech on January 18, 2008.
Books
Books
Books

sen.j: 『老農晩耕録』（1916年刊） - 前記仙北郡での実践記録。
sen.e: "Rounou-bankouroku (The Late Journal of an Experienced Farmer)" (published in 1916) - the actual record of Senboku-gun District above-mentioned in this article.
"Rounou-bankouroku (The Late Journal of an Experienced Farmer)" (published in 1916) - the actual record of Senboku County above-mentioned in this article.
sen.cmt: 訳文が17行目に入っていましたので16行目に移動させました。gun District → County
sen.e: "Rounou-bankouroku" (The Late Journal of an Experienced Farmer) (published in 1916) - the actual record of Senboku County above-mentioned in this article.
sen.cmt: クォーテーション調整

sen.j: 『適産調要録』（1917年刊） - 「適産調」での実績を踏まえ未実施地域での調査を推奨したもの。
sen.e: "Tekisanshirabe- youroku" (published in 1917) - the book recommended to survey wider areas not included in the previous research based on the success of 'Tekisanshirabe.'
"Tekisanshirabe- yoroku" (published in 1917) - the book recommended to survey wider areas not included in the previous research based on the success of 'Tekisanshirabe.'
"Tekisanshirabe- yoroku" (published in 1917) - the book recommended to survey wider areas not included in the previous research based on the success of 'Tekisanshirabe.'
sen.cmt: クォーテーション調整

sen.j: 「耕作会」『日本農書全集 第63巻 農村振興』佐藤常雄編集（農山漁村文化協会、1995年）ISBN 4-540-94013-9 - 開催した農業研究会の記録。
sen.e: 'Kosakukai (The Farmer's Association),' included in "The collected works of books on Japanese Agriculture, Volume 63, Agricultural Community Development," Edited by Tsuneo SATO (Rural Culture Association, 1995) ISBN 4-540-94013-9 - records of meetings held by the farmer's association.

'Kosakukai (The Farmer's Association),' included in "The collected works of books on Japanese Agriculture, Volume 63, Agricultural Community Development," Edited by Tsuneo SATO (Rural Culture Association, 1995) ISBN 4-540-94013-9 - records of meetings held by the farmer's association.

'Kosakukai (The Farmer's Association),' included in "The collected works of books on Japanese Agriculture, Volume 63, Agricultural Community Development," Edited by Tsuneo SATO (Rural Culture Association, 1995) ISBN 4-540-94013-9 - records of meetings held by the farmer's association.
